sentence.text: Come and meet our employees, Mr. Richards.
sentence.textCn: 来见见我们的雇员吧，理查兹先生。

sentence.text: This is Nicola Grey, and this is Claire Taylor.
sentence.textCn: 这位是尼科拉·格雷，这位是克莱尔·泰勒。

sentence.text: Those women are very hard-working. What are their jobs?
sentence.textCn: 那些姑娘很勤快。她们是做什么工作的？

sentence.text: This is Michael Baker, and this is Jeremy Short.
sentence.textCn: 这位是迈克尔·贝克，这位是杰里米·肖特。

sentence.text: They aren’t very busy! What are their jobs?
sentence.textCn: 他们不怎么忙！他们是做什么工作的？

sentence.text: They’re sales reps. They’re very lazy.
sentence.textCn: 他们是推销员。他们非常懒。

sentence.text: This is Jim. He’s our office assistant.
sentence.textCn: 这是吉姆。是我们办公室的勤杂人员。
